references: Repealing: Ord 65136. Related: Ord 15919, Ord 20088, Ord 53375, Ord 54787
summary: An ordinance granting a temporary permit to the Seattle and Rainier Valley Railway Company for the use by said Company of certain streets, avenues and public places in the City of Seattle for street railway purposes; extending the time for the removal by said Company of its "roadbed and appurtenances" therefrom; and repealing Ordinance No. 65136.
